response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product that I believe would significantly benefit you. After careful consideration, I am offering this exceptional item to you at a special price of $12,000. This is a fantastic opportunity to secure a high-quality asset at a price that is well below its market value of $15,000, which you've personally assessed. I trust that you will find this offer compelling and look forward to discussing the details further if you're interested.", "product_price": 12000}
